name: Dean
text: 1st visit to Blaze, and I really enjoyed it. The ingredients are all fresh and tasty, I built my own pizza, and they even serve beer if you like. Staff was friendly and quick. Definitely recommend.

name: Jared Sickles
text: The food was good, but it was quite slow during lunch. The big issue is with the rewards. I have the rewards app, and I had a reward for a free fountain drink. I clicked on redeem and the countdown started, but it wouldn't scan. The cashier …More

name: Nate Williams
text: This place was amazing! Where else can you get a medium sized pizza with all imaginable toppings for $8.45? They were loading toppings after toppings on my pizza! The staff was very friendly and the pizza was too notch! Pizza to perfection! Highly recommend this place!

name: Monica Dooley
text: If you haven't been there before, it can be a little confusing up front. Once she explained everything and I got to the point of topping my pizza, it was great! The ingredients are so fresh you can almost taste the earth in them. …More

name: Deidra Davis
text: I must say, they were slammed! But it’s no surprise considering how great and fresh the ingredients are. The crew was so understaffed but they made the best of it, and came together as a team should always! I’ve worked in pizza places and I …More

name: The One
text: This is the best Blaze locations I've been to.  Customer service is outstanding and my pizza always comes out to perfection.  They also use notes to make sure the other team members are aware your pizza is vegan so they don't contaminate it.  They seem to be more on point and pay attention better than other locations.

name: Tiffany Burgess
text: I enjoyed the food. The staff are top notch. Plus they warm your s’mores for you!!

name: Veronica Cavener
text: Amazing pizza!!! I didn't think I could eat a whole one by myself! The standard crust is thinner than most pizzas but it was especially delicious! I love having options to build my own as well! I will have to try this next time.

name: Nikki Soles
text: I went here as a newly established vegan. I was extremely confused by the menu. I see that it’s supposed to easy for the customer, but it was really just overwhelming. I made sure to inform the employee helping me that it was my first time …More

name: Michael Elliott
text: My first visit was excellent! You choose your own ingredients and I chose wisely! My pizza was so good. Fortunately I could only eat 3 of the 6 slices, so I got to take it home and eat it again! Not a fancy place, but the line movement is …More

name: Elizabeth Buttery
text: I am sad to give one star because I really use to like blaze pizza. This location is fairly new so I expected the store to be clean but when I walked in at 10:30 I was surprised to see the dirty floor, dirty sneeze guard, dirty vent on the …More

name: Craig B
text: Great service, and a great pizza. $9 for a small thin crust pizza is a bit high for me, but the taste is good.

name: Brittany Watts
text: I went here for the first time today and the pizzas were amazing! The staff was very nice and helpful. We will be back!

name: Chloe Roark
text: Rhe foods great however, I didn't really understand how it all worked (as it was my first time eating there) and the workers didn't seem to know what was going on either? Idk I'd recommend their food just make sure you know what you're going to get before you arrive.

name: J Gibbs
text: The best pizza that I ever had.I chose build your own pizza with cauliflower crust. Delicious. The waitress was very courteous and kind.

name: Timothy Erfurdt
text: Burnt 2 pizzas the customer before me only ended up with half a pizza and had to have it remade. My 2nd pizza had to be remade because it was very burnt. First pizza sat for 20 minutes before they would give it to me so It was cold. I …More

name: Ruby Swigert
text: You get your pizza,the way you want and it's very good tasting alot of topping to choose from the best

name: Kristin Bryant
text: We've been a frequent customer of Blaze pizza at Tulsa Hills for a couple of years now.  The last 3 visits have been very disappointing.  Management at the restaurants is disorganized and they are frequently understaffed.  The staff are not …More

name: quindale allensworth
text: First time was a blessing to my tummy...Amen

name: Jason Bush
text: So hap pl y to have found this place.  A coworker told me that they have keto crust and I just had to try it - I'm so glad I did!  This has to be the best keto friendly pizza ever.  I usually make keto pizza at home; and, it's pretty good. …More

name: K KP
text: Not OPEN. They need to figure out how to be open during the stated hours. We wasted an hour driving to the restaurant at NOON only for it to be closed even though the hours are stated as open at 10:30am. Terrible response from customer service, blamed the franchisee. Will not each here again.

name: A W
text: Love Blaze! And this location did the arugula right. Beat value for build your own pizza. It's a family favorite when we have relatives in town. The cane sugar root beer is hard to beat too. It's a perfect combo of comfort food and healthy options. Perfect thin crust that doesn't taste like a cracker either.

name: Steve Reid
text: Affordable great pizza fast

name: Kobi de Quiroz
text: The service was quick and the people helped us along. It was my friends first time and they were understanding of it and let him take his time when making his order. The pizza was out quickly. The drinks were also quite delectable. I had the blood orange lemonade and it was just delicious. Would recommend to my friends.

name: Mike Weyermiller
text: Been there multiple times since they opened and have introduced many more to this place.  Great experience every time.  Building your own pizza with anything for 1 price is great and the sauce, cheese and topping selection is very nice.  Always get quick friendly service and never had a bad pizza.  Highly recommended

name: Kristen Frye
text: Super delicious! Yesterday was the first time going to Blaze and went again today. Really tasty!

name: Ange Johnson
text:
So many options, paleo, gluten free, vegetarian and vegan,  plenty of meats too.
Great place to take the family for a bite.

name: Danielle Howarth
text: I love the vegan and gluten free options! The staff were so friendly.

name: Christina Cervantes
text: Create your own pizza with tons of choices. They list calorie counts and even have goat cheese!

name: Dean Brown
text: The oven fired pizza is probably the best I've had. Lots of ingredient options, and fresh. The staff were very helpful.

name: Teddy Skinner
text: The food was excellent.  Service was less than expected until manager stepped in.  It was partly our fault for not knowing the ordering process.  First time there but we will go again.

name: Taylor Thompson
text: Very friendly staff, wonderful variety of choices, and you can build your own pizza. Wood fired where you can see it. Delicious cookies and brownies. The soft drinks (sodas and mixed juices/lemonades) are awesome. Pricing incredibly reasonable. We've been here twice and will keep coming back.

name: Tracy Dickens
text: This place is pretty good. It's pretty pricey, though. The keto crust is tasty but not sure if it's worth the additional four dollars.

name: james fry
text: I came in tonight ordered 2 pizzas a cheese and pepperoni. Simple enough for a large chain pizzeria right? WRONG! From start to finish this restraunt visit was a horrendous experience. As first walk in I was not greeted and the girl taking …More

name: Becky Ashwood
text: As always, this place never disappoints! I think what I love best is their consistency...no matter when we go, it's always delicious! Friendly faces, smiles, and fresh pizza...nothing better!

name: mona kaler
text: Came in at 7pm on a Saturday night and it was very busy! Got our food very quickly, our pizza maker Shane rocked it!!! We will make this a routine spot. Very yummy pizza and salads. Fresh, quality ingredients make all the difference here!

name: Deborah Solomon
text: The food was good. But the service was not, probably understaffed .

name: Victor Ekwere Jnr
text: You should try their refreshing drinks. Great place. The flies outside can be a distraction sometimes :-)

name: lil ol alex
text: Best pizza place in town, you can choose your own toppings, the staff is super nice, always clean and it’s a great environment.

name: valencja valencja
text: Fresh you can make your own pizza 😋

name: C. C.
text: Blaze Pizza...Wow! Blaze offered an original new experience in the pizza business. You pick a crust, then a sauce, and as it traded from one employee to the next you see the whole process take place. Next, it's on to the toppings, with a …More

name: Cynthia Douglas
text: Great pizza made to order awesome drinks lovely atmosphere

name: Russ G
text: You can't go wrong with Blaze! It's the Chipotle for pizza, just build your own for only 8 bucks and some change! The pizza is fantastic they use quality fresh ingredients! Our family is obsessed!

name: Melanie Potts-Burkham
text: The staff is friendly and helpful, the pizza is super yummy.

name: Jessica MacLean
text:
Great pizza, salad, and knots! The black cherry soda was a hit. We tried the brownie and holiday s'more, both warmed in the fire oven and yum!
Staff were pretty confused by me ordering dessert after we had eaten dinner, I thought that was strange, but everything else was good. Will definitely be back!

name: Robert Bambach
text: For their first day, the staff was super friendly, clean and modern design to the restaurant. Watching the pizza cook in front of you as the flames dance behind it just helps lure you into an awaiting flavor filled experience. Toppings are …More

name: Jaysen Rivera-Lebron
text: 1st time was a good experience.  Overall I liked it. The food was also good. The can of beer was 4.50 tho. I had a bacon pizza and a pepperoni pizza. I asked for extra sauce, 1 of the regular and 1 of the spicy mixed. I'd definitely go again.

name: Melissa Knobloch
text: Build your own pizza?? Um, yes please! Love this place!

name: D Hunt
text: Fantastic pizza! Quality ingredients and made right in front of you. Price was very budget friendly. $7 for a single topping pie that can feed 1-2 people. Can't beat that! We love this place.

name: Lala Lala
text: No complaints. Fantastic pizza and a low key vibe that keeps it nice and comfortable to enjoy your favorite food.

name: Jessica Romero
text: Went to get a build your own pizza and had me waiting for 30 min in line to make it and whenever I get to Pay it the said they don’t have enough change and couldn’t do nothing after a long wait... I just had to leave, really disappointed can’t believe in a place like this they don’t have change!!! 👎🏼

name: Amanda W
text: Very good, and love they have a gluten free option. Staff is very friendly as well.

name: Dave Martin
text: 7/28/18 @ 1:45pm. My first time here. I walked in to find the food prep area COVERED in random vegetables, cheese, and meat. The server was using his gloved hand to swipe the garbage from the deck onto the floor then using the same hand to …More

name: Mario Garcia
text: Always good pizza and service.

name: Daniel Dawson
text: Was never greeted.  An officer that had been there for a while before my party and I showed up left.  We were still never greeted or acknowledged while the girl stood there more focused on her online orders than customers standing in front of her.  We ended up leaving as well as the party behind us

name: Tambra Hutchins
text: This is one of the best pizzas I have ever had.  Everything is made fresh right in front of you and it was very good.  The staff is very friendly and explains all the different pizzas to you that are available.  Everyone has a visable name …More

name: Susy Hunnicutt
text:
Very fresh made to order brick oven cooked pizza select your own sauces and unique topping!
Very very friendly  and informative  staff!! Very reasonable  prices!
Will definitely  go back!

name: Ric Dysart
text: Great service with a good quick pizza.

name: Jacy Donnelly
text:
This is some GOOD pizza.
You get to make your own personal plate by picking out the individual ingredients you'd like, which are then assembled and oven fired while you pay. The have, …More

name: Robert J. Sutton
text: Loved it. A great break from the norm.

name: Seth Champagne
text: I travel regularly and blaze always is a go to when available in the area, by far the best pizza for a pizza chain.

name: Dustin Proffitt
text: Build your own pizza! So awesome. If you dont like your pizza, then it's your fault! This place is awesome. Definitely going back!

name: Carmen FitzGerald
text: It was okay this time. Usually the pizza dough is much better. Their toppings are fresh and made of good quality. The staff are nice and friendly. The place is clean. Overall It's a really good BYOP joint.

name: Pain In The Blunt
text: Sooo gooood an great for gluten free options

name: Shannon Rose
text: Fast Pizza! This place is awesome

name: Ariel Melendez
text: Coming from Connecticut (where we have amazing pizza), O found Blaze Pizza to be pretty darn close to what I call "real pizza." Very good pizza and a very friendly staff. And GOOD pizza!!

name: Scott Moore
text: Awesome service and pizza. Great people making great pizza👍🏻👍🏻

name: elijah powell
text: This place is so good, you get wood grilled pizza from the fireplace and you get to make your own pizza, so that you have some choices, and if you like to order from a menu you can. People that are out there please try this place, by your own choice of course but I think that some of you might like this place.

name: Wade Bick
text: Yes, there are places out there with better pizza, especially the crust. But I'm giving Blaze 4 stars because of the taste and quality. Actually, leaning towards 5. It's close. You get a great variety of toppings for much less $$ than you …More

name: marc wood
text:
Very good pizza. You get to choose the crust and the toppings.
Very enjoyable

name: Matthew Beyer
text: If I could rate this 100/5, I would. Blaze pizza is an amazing build your own pizza joint. Blaze pizza has a nice variety of choices to put on your pizza when making it. Not only are the workers extremely friendly, the food is off the …More

name: Jamie Valder
text: I have never had bad service or a bad pizza here. How can you when you get to make your own personal pizza with a wide variety of toppings to choose from! The concept is genius. The pizza is amazing and so filling.

name: garrett neuman
text: Heard a lot about Blaze, the pizza and the experience was just OK.  Service at 1:00 on a Saturday was surprisingly slow even though it wasn’t very busy.  Pizza was served quickly & really hot.  I wasn’t impressed with the cheese or …More

name: Laveena Rodriguez
text: Very surprised at the quality and price.  Great place for a quick bite with the family. The service was pretty good.

name: Jack Phillips
text: Ordered vegan pizzas, they were pretty good. We got the deep crust. It seemed to come apart in the middle. The pizza needed more cheese.

name: Bethany Wilkinson
text: It had good pizza, but my crust had a burnt layer on the bottom which I didn't appreciate; I have however only been here once and the two people that I dined with did not have the same problem. Everyone I know is obsessed with this place, I just was not necessarily as impressed.

name: Pedro Julian Arroyo
text: Super tasty pizza. Fast service.

name: Sis C
text: Fast and friendly staff also very good food

name: April Chavez
text: Best place to come and get great pizza, salads and drinks. They have vegan cheese. You have vegan and gluten free options as well. Food is made in front of u as u choose ur toppings. Great employees and just amazing customer service. Best place I've eaten in a long time.

name: Seth VanMeter
text: Fun, fast, good spot for a small group.  Dont be afraid to tell them what you want! You're paying for it!

name: J G
text: I guess our honeymoon is over, Blaze Pizza. My first time there you guys were awesome. However, every subsequent visit has gotten increasingly worse. Here's a few examples of what I mean: got upsold to a large drink and figured what the …More

name: Desiree Van Kalsbeek
text: We love Blaze Pizza and eat there often because you can get a pizza for around $9 with anything you want on it. My husband and I don't like the same pizza so being able to get what we want for a decent price is great! Highly recommend.

name: Joseph Krautheim
text: Nice to have a 2nd location close by.  Eating there often.

name: Greg Greg
text: Good pizza. Fast service and inexpensive. Will definitely be going back.

name: Mehdi Shahsavari
text: Was better before. I took off 2 stars.

name: Rikki Hopkins
text: I tried this place for the first time a week ago, and it was such a wonderful experience! A gentleman named Nathan, was exceptionally helpful, also very friendly and informative. Honestly, a couple other people were really wonderful as …More

name: Jennifer Dobson
text: I was disappointed by how dirty the food prep area was. Food scraps everywhere.  White cutting board was very soiled/stained. Food was ok & service good. I just hadn't been here in a while and it was shocking that the counter was that nasty.

name: Peter Treagesser
text: WORTH IT. My wife & I got full on 1 pizza. $8.45 for 11 inches, fully customizeable, unlimited toppings Including Meats. Perfectly fired thin crust. Every Ingredient Tastes Amazing. Fancy homemade drinks like blood orange lemonade, and Blue …More

name: Kristan Hannah
text: They have vegan pizza there. I love how they changed their gloves to make our pizza.

name: CJ Shake
text: Never been here before, & was (unrelated) in a bad mood. The staff was super helpful & nice! Turned a bad day around! Took pizza home & it was great! Will  tell others & go back myself! Great place!

name: LaDonna Penny
text: I love the build your own pizza idea. You can pick as many toppings as you want, for one low price. Delicious!

name: Esperanza Rose
text: The food here is amazing , everything is made in front of you . And the food is always fresh ! They’re salads are to die for! I especially love Blaze Bc they have vegan cheese , I can eat healthy and still enjoy one of my favorite meals . …More

name: Debra Lee
text: The service was the best. Very friendly and the pizzas were the best. Was visiting my daughter in Oklahoma. Wish there was a Blaze here in Connecticut.

name: Kevin Kling
text: Pizza is always amazing. Have to build your own. From start to finish baking it takes maybe 5 minutes. Super fast and the best pizza in town

name: Jim Tornberg
text: The pizza was good but my dough knots were burnt. It was very busy and we had to go outside for a table. Due to the rain all the tables were wet. Probably wont be going back for awhile if at all.

name: Chester Taylor
text: The pizza is fantastic with a plethora of toppings to choose from. The staff is very friendly and helpful. Restaurant is always impeccably clean. Price is very reasonable, I typically pay $10 for personal pizza and a drink.

name: Vilois Manuel
text: I absolutely love  this place excellent customer service and the pizza was fabulous  keep up the good work

name: Susie Susie
text: Great pizza with an excellent crust.  Good topping options, and they don't charge extra for vegan cheese.

name: Chelle Meacham
text: Poor management!  We were going to eat there today. The general manager sent an employee to tell people to wait outside because they were blocking tables. The people were blocking a trash can, no where near any tables. The temps were posted …More

name: Randall F
text: The best build your own pizza place I've had. They have a pink lemonade that's literally addicting.

name: Kris Guthrie
text: Food was good, guy taking our order was rude. Will give it another try and rating will go up if they are more understanding of first time people who weren't sure how it worked.

name: Angela Ellis
text: Love the crust its so thin and crispy, the sauce is delicious, but the toppings are too big

name: Chuck
text: It was good I just think it's a bit pricey for a Subway type build your own pizza.

name: Heather Vest
text: Love this place! $9 for all the toppings you want? Sign me up! And they dont skimp when you order it all. When I first went there and ordered everything...I thought, watch this they will start rationing out items...and they didnt! Every …More

name: Nicholas BeCraft
text: I have always had the perfect pizza with tasty toppings

name: Shirley Deatherage
text: You go there and get a medium pizza or whatever it's for one person pizza if I end up eating the whole thing it looks like a medium Pizza so scrumptious I eat there every day but I know not to claw get fat ;-*

name: Angela Meyers
text: Very clean, nice staff, and great pizza.

name: Playler
text: Always DAMN good !!! We love Blaze pizza , the pizza is so tasty and fresh , we just wish there was more seating .

name: Sheryl King
text: Cozy little out of the way pizza shop! My husband and I found this on a trip out to Tulsa Hills one Sun late & got our pizza & sat out in the garden type area & the weather was gorgeous, the wind was lightly blowing & it was sundown We …More

name: Gretchen Kearney
text: Staff is great! Good atmosphere and good pizza!

name: MrKyle8604
text: The spicy tomato sauce was an amazing mixture with the sweeter bacon

name: Nick Tarter
text: This place is super good! It reminds me of the brick oven pizza at Zio’s but at a good price. I will definitely be back.

name: Melinda Gilbert Realtor
text: This was my 3rd time here my first time was wonderful. The second time I got a to-go order they were super busy and they accidentally left the arugula and pesto off my green stripe and I didn't notice till I was home 30 min away. We called …More

name: Tillisha Reilly
text: Great service, great atmosphere, AMAZING food, and the best part they are fast fired! You get your pizza in less than 8 minutes! And they have something for everyone. You need gluton free? They have it! You need vegan? They got it! My family and I won't go to any other pizza place. Blaze is our go to!

name: J Harness
text: Good food and good service.

name: Braden Edwards
text: Been coming here a bunch and love it! I’ve been to some other similar style places and the only thing that I can think that’d make Blaze a little bit better would be the pizza crust/dough. For some reason it always seems pretty …More

name: Richard Purtell
text: Great pizza. 2 side salads, a pizza, and 2 drinks came out to about 20 bucks. The pizza is small, but totally worth the price. Unlimited Toppings is awesome and the food was ready before we finished getting our drinks. Will recommend to everyone I know.

name: Matthew Farah
text: I love going to Blaze Pizza. They have lots of options and are allergen friendly with gluten free crusts and dairy free cheese so I can bring all my friends no matter what diet restrictions they have.

name: catchinbass86
text: Very friendly and efficient staff. Pizza was good my only complaint was that the pizza sauce did not have a lot of Zing to it. Guess I will try the spicy pizza sauce next time

name: Nadine Jamaleddine
text: Love Blaze Pizza, it's always fresh and good. Usually the staff is very nice. Today the girl that helped us (Serena) was really mean and not friendly at all.

name: Priyanka Sachdeva
text: Friendly staff, was my first time there and the staff explained everything to me. Pizza was very delicious!

name: Michele Duff
text: From the moment we walked in the door, the staff was attentive, friendly, and very helpful. The toppings are unlimited for $8.25 (single topping $6.25, and plain cheese is $5). The restaurant was clean and had an efficient set up, and the beverage selection is awesome. I recommend the blood orange lemonade! I'll definitely be back.

name: Alli
text: Good food. Tons of options. Very quick

name: Garrett French
text: It's like subway... with pizza. You walk in and are greeted by a long serving station. They greet you, write your name down, and then build you a custom pizza. You are able to choose everything: spices, crust, cheese, meats, veggies, and …More

name: John Hanna
text: Fast, friendly and good!

name: Formerly Mike & Trisha Story
text: We ate there for the first time last night. The staff was really nice, explained how it all worked very well... The topping choices are fantastic.  The pizza was done quick and was absolutely delicious.  We may make this our regular stop on Girl Scout night.

name: Patrick Eberhardt
text: This place is amazing. I absolutely love the atmospheric. The employees are always so extremely friendly. Especially Austin and Lady they are also happy and cheerful when I go in! Will deff be back to do more business with this location!!!

name: Patricia Sandoval
text: Pizza was good. The crust is a little too thin but overall good.

name: Jerica Grafton
text: The workers were friendly and welcoming. It is very good priced and taste even better. Love the different topping starting with the sauce then the different cheese and meats and vegi. Definitely going back and recommending.

name: Ronny Sweger
text: Can't say enough about this place, it rocks. Amazing food and fast!

name: david graham
text: I can't believe I just found out about this place you have decent pricing good customer service great pizza and then the brownies I am definitely a fan

name: brenda bowers
text: The food was good. The workers were helpful. The restrooms were clean. And it was kid friendly.

name: Chris Marshall
text: Came for lunch with family. Pizzas were out very quick despite a very busy lunch rush. Toppings were a little sparse but the flavor is a savior.

name: Cecilya Villarreal
text: I love Blaze! The pizza is great, the people are so sweet!❤️

name: SK
text: Was all right. I might try again if I want something a little different and it's nearby. Ordered online. Showed up a few min after it was supposed to be done, they never started my order. Printed the ticket but it was just sitti ng there. …More

name: Wes Smith
text: Always a favorite of the families. Very good food, very nice people behind the counter. Very cool place.

name: Tiff K
text: Pizza was delicious! Staff was friendly, the lady that helped us was nice but seemed like she had a rough day. Experience was good overall it was my aunts first time and she really enjoyed it! Would visit again.

name: Stephanie Beeson
text: Delicious pizza, good and fast service.  Clean restaurant!

name: Stryker Moon
text: Ate here whole family hospitality was amazing.

name: Marty Smith
text: It was good, but me and my wife thought that the pizza was "dry". Like, they used very little sauce. But, it was still good.

name: Mase Driskell
text: $11 for one of their signature pizzas and a drink is a good deal. The pizza was great and they DO NOT CHARGE for extra toppings. I got mine loaded up with toppings. …More

name: Jeremy Smith
text: Make you're own pizza!!! Cooked perfectly!!

name: alex bal
text: Good food and nice employees

name: Kelsey Terry
text: Some of the nicest staff I've ever seen at a restaurant! Always super friendly. And obviously the best pizza in Tulsa!

name: Jason Haberer
text: Placed a web order at 6:14pm for a 6:45pm pickup.  Got there at 6:45pm and left at 7:19 with my pizza.  Good pizza but abysmal service.

name: Barbara Mathis
text: The pizza was excellent & we had great service from Cici and Haley!

name: Linda Davis
text:
love this place, always friendly with fresh food and a great price.
they carry gluten free options and takes great care to insure that I am not glutened while there.

name: Gracie G
text: Awesome everytime

name: Lori Nicole
text: Love this place! The ingredients are amazing!  The guys are so funny & kind here. Truly LOVE to bring my friends here. . My kids love the pizza. What a great establishment!

name: Patricia Gardiner
text: Worst experience  ever  we came in at 12.45 ur tables are dirty I got the tomato mozzarella  salad ur clerk drowned  my salad  in pesto  not acceptable  so the pizza was not good I'm disappointed

text: Choices, customer service and taste.

name: Richard Winton
text: Best pizza.

name: Cody Frost
text: Great place to have some pizza at a good value.

name: Joshua Freeman
text: I really like this place if you have not been you need to stop in

name: Tyler C
text: Pizza was great, had a good time. They dropped my friends pizza but they were kind and made it up to him.

name: Joseph Howard
text: Food was great friendly staff would have liked to see plates of some kind to eat off of other than that it was a great experience

name: rebekah anderson
text: Awesome! They have a great gluten-free crust and an awesome lunch deal.  I enjoyed lunch so much that I brought my son here for dinner on the same day!!

name: Mary Pascal Lovins
text: It is a great place to eat. The staff is friendly and helpful.

name: John Benjamin
text: Build your own -'yes, that was good.

name: David Nicholas
text: Good choice for pizza... You can build your own  pizza,  or choose from their recommendations (similar in concept to Subway). Toppings are all very fresh.  Then,  pizza is baked over a fire. Pizzas are just right for 1 hungry person,  or 2 …More

name: ashley holman
text: It was very just meh. Quickest pizza I've ever gotten.  Fresh. Friendly staff. But the flavor was disappointing.  Almost bland

name: Matthew Hatfield
text: Fun place to take the family! We found out the hard way you don't need to order a full pizza per person!  Easily feed 3 people with 2 pizzas.

name: Krista Sanchez
text: Gluten free, add all the toppings you want, and fire grilled. It's our go-to for quick yummy pizza.

name: Joseph Anthony
text: Love it,really consistent,always great,fast an great service. Best pizza in town for the price.

name: Noah Helsee
text: I got a free coupon for leaving this review. God bless LeBron James. I love how efficient they are, how customizable their pizzas are, and how fresh all the many ingredients taste.

name: Sasha
text: My new favorite pizza place! Friendly staff, clean place, & great pizza! Be sure to try it!!!

name: Ann Hatton
text: We love Blaze! Pizza made the way you want with friendly customer service!

name: Sam Benz
text: Tastes like LeBron. Like greatness.

name: Azel KKimiko
text: The pizza is really good. I love it. No more Domino's or Pizza hut 😋

text: I ordered a gluten free crust because I have to, I have an allergy. One of the employees, named Shae, told someone directly behind me that she would never eat the gluten free crust unless you enjoy eating napkins. Very distasteful in front …More

name: Michelle Morgan
text: Really good GF pizza!

name: Joy Farris
text: The pizza is great, served fast, and the ingredients are high quality. My kids love coming here but I'll also come here without them to have dinner and a beer or a glass of wine. It can get really loud if it's busy.

name: Keevie Ridener

text: Get the app...place order....skip the line when you get there.  All u have to do is go to the cashier and they will cook it after you get there. Therefore, it's always fresh....and they have great, fresh, organic ingredients! I recommend!

text: The spicy tomatoe sauce was a little too hot for me, but I'm a wimp. Great pizza though, made fresh just the way I asked for it. I love the lemonade options too, it's a little thing I know, but most places just have a standard soda fountain, so it's really nice.
